Keluhkan VAR, Para Manajer Premier League Inginkan Satu Perubahan Ini
05 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penggunaan VAR di Premier League benar-benar menimbulkan polemik. Kali ini, setiap manajer klub Premier League dikabarkan bakal bersatu memprotes kejanggalan peran VAR.
Protes tersebut dialamatkan pada Mike Riley selaku ketua Professional Game Match Officials Limited (PGMOL). Para manajer ingin duduk bersama dalam satu pertemuan penting untuk membahas penggunaan VAR sejauh ini dan apa yang bisa diperbaiki, Kamis (7/11/2019) waktu setempat.
Musim ini memang merupakan musim debut VAR di Premier League, jelas masih ada sejumlah masalah yang perlu diselesaikan. Memang nahas, sebagai liga terbaik di dunia, Premier League justru terlambat menggunakan VAR.
Sebenarnya apa yang membuat VAR Premier League tidak sebaik liga-liga lainnya? Menukil Sky Sports, baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Complain about VAR, Premier League Managers Want This Change
05 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The use of VAR in the Premier League is really polemic. This time, every Premier League club manager is rumored to be united to protest the irregularities of the role of VAR.
The protest was addressed to Mike Riley as chairman of the Professional Game Match Officials Limited (PGMOL). The managers want to sit together in an important meeting to discuss the use of VAR so far and what can be improved, Thursday (11/07/2019) local time.
This season is indeed the debut season for VAR in the Premier League, obviously there are still a number of problems that need to be resolved. Unfortunately, as the best league in the world, the Premier League is actually too late to use VAR.
What actually makes VAR Premier League not as good as other leagues? Take on Sky Sports, read below, Bolaneters!
